name: Chunk Ideas
description:
IChunk is a multiple BAFTA nominated and Emmy winning company that creates interactive entertainment to help companies achieve their goals. It’s worked with some of the world’s biggest broadcasters, entertainment companies and brands; helping companies raise awareness of their products and IP, grow their audience, create revenue generating products and reposition their brands.
We are a consultancy for ideas and strategy and producers of effective interactive entertainment projects.
